title: how do I use Remote Binary Protocol in cutter
content: how do I use Remote Binary Protocol I tried to connect to gdbserver through the normal method but it would just hang and not connect. I let it go like that for 1 hour

comments.text: What settings did you use? Did you do any further debugging of the connection?
settings: gdbserver localhost:2000 I can connect to it with radare2 just not cutter hopes this helps i'm new to re
